name: Heel-Toe Variations
description: Master the fundamental heel-toe movements used in shuffle and cutting shapes styles.

cards.title: Basic Heel-Toe Step
cards.description: Learn the essential heel-toe motion to create smooth shuffle movements.
bulletpoints: Lift one heel while placing weight on the opposite toe
Switch feet in sync with the beat
Maintain a low stance for better control
cards.summaryText: Drive heel-and-toe swaps low to the floor so shuffles glide effortlessly.

cards.title: Reverse Heel-Toe Slide
cards.description: A reverse movement technique to add style to your footwork.
bulletpoints: Push forward with your heel while pulling back with the opposite toe
Keep weight balanced between both feet
Use subtle knee bends for better flow
cards.summaryText: Reverse the rocker by pushing heel and toe opposite ways for sleek slides.
